entry.title: The type "***" is not a root entity or is not released for BEHAVIOR implementation but it is
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I confirmed I_JOURNALENTRYTP is released for developer extensibility on Business Acceleraor hub.

However, when I tried it to create class on Eclipse, I got the following message.


I also wonder why I_JournalEntryTP is not displayed on Released Objects tab on Eclipse.


I would appreciate it so much if you would suggest some possible cause of this.

Thanks & Regards.

entry.title: How can I post one receivable and one payable in the same journal entry?
entry.content:
• The receivable is for an affiliated company (intercompany).
  • The payable is for an internal employee.
  • The document type selected is SA (General Journal Entry).

I tried,but it said: Consolidated companies DE2200 and ""are different

entry.title: stop multiple proforma invoices against single delivery document
entry.content:
Dear Team,

As per the business requirement, validations with appropriate error messages are required during proforma invoice creation (Document Type – F8):

  1. Restrict the creation of multiple proforma invoices against a single delivery document.

  2. Do not allow proforma invoice creation without PGI (Post Goods Issue).

Kindly suggest the appropriate process or BAdI to implement these validations.

entry.title: Add Custom BO field to standard report
entry.content:
I would like to add field from custom bo to standard report of s4hana.

Is that possible to do? Could you please recommend a supported alternative approach?

Best Regards,

Khaing Zin

entry.title: Regarding to sort by name in Search Help of Cost Center
entry.content:
Dear All.

Please let me know how to sort by name in Search Help of Cost Center .

For example,  「Create Supplier Invoice」 apps.

It is currently sorted by ID. (Yellow section)
I want to sort it by name. (Red section)

Best Regards,

entry.title: #COE#RFL01 - Error during partial settlement of investment project with migrate asset
entry.content:
Hello,

We have a error when we try to partial capitalize an investment project on an asset we create with the migration cockpit.
We don't have this issue when we partial capitalize an investment project on an asset create manually.

The error is : Fixed asset XXX : Transfer at year end occurs w/o transfer of transactions, message class FAA_POST, Message Number 515

Actually the only difference I see between this two case is about the field :
- Capitalization Date of Original Asset
- Legacy Transfer Date

There are some restrictions or prerequisite with these previous fields ?
Have you some advises about the error message ?

Yours sincerely,

Teddy.

entry.title: Corrective invoice template (Poland)
entry.content:
We do the roll-out of S4 Hana public cloud in Poland

We use the process for corrective invoice (document type RK) for customers. In this specific flow we have the initial invoice items (item category G2N) and the correction items (item category L2N)

On the billing document output (PDF template) we would like to have a split in item to clearly mention the initial items and then the corrected one. This is a common practice in Poland. In the item section the invoice should look like this :

Before correction

item frame with initial items (G2N)

After correction

item frame with corrected items (L2N)

The requirement is basically to split the item frame in 2 sub item frame (by item category) and add a title to each sub frame

But we can't design the template as such. Can you advice how to do ?

Thanks

entry.title: "Create sap fiori app with quick fiori appliaiton generator in ADT" does not work in ADT
entry.content:
This "Create sap fiori app with quick fiori appliaiton generator in ADT" does not work in ADT.

I confirmed preview URL works, so I tried to the create fiori app url. However it seems it does not work.

I could see Progress Information window appears and dessappears in a moment.

@enry79 

While reading Quickly Generate and Deploy SAP Fiori Apps from AB... - SAP Community, I found you having the same problem. I would be grateful if you tell me how you did solve it or whether you still have it.

 

I would appreciate it so much if you would suggest some possible cause and solution for this.

 

Thanks & Regards.

entry.title: Settlement of PM/CO Orders to G/L with OIM
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

Currently facing an issue with the Settlement of PM/CO Orders to G/L Accounts that are managed with Open Item Management (OIM).
Because of this limitation, I have submitted a request through the Customer Influence program.

Could you please help vote for it?

Here is the link: https://influence.sap.com/sap/ino/#/idea/362509 

Thank you

Nijwipa

entry.title: C_PURCHASEORDERITEMDEX - Add the creation date field of the purchase order item
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I recently raised a case with SAP regarding the standard CDS View for purchase order items, C_PURCHASEORDERITEMDEX, which currently returns the header creation date for all items. After reviewing the case, the SAP support team confirmed that this is the expected behavior and suggested submitting an idea on their Influence platform. My ERP is S/4HANA Public Cloud.

The goal of this blog post is to gather support from the community so that this improvement can be prioritized. If you agree that having the correct item-level creation date would add value, please take a moment to vote for my idea on the SAP Influence website. Your vote can make a real difference!

https://influence.sap.com/sap/ino/#/idea/362226

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards,

Miquel
